title: Pandorak
author: Pandorak
content: After a few days of joining this forum, i finally got my first crypto transaction in the form of Litecoin from an app in Playstore. At first, i wanted to try to get Bitcoin from Bestchange and Freebitco.in faucets, but so far i have only collected 200 satoshi, not enough to make a withdrawal. Right now i'm looking to find out more about apps, platforms or anything that can generate crypto for me. Can you give any good suggestion about an app, platform that can generate crypto?Please don't suggest paid apps or platforms, i don't have money for that.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: There are faucets and various PTCs that give a small reward for completing a task, but these rewards are very low considering their fiat value. Those who earn from such jobs are usually people who are owners or those users who have a lot of referrals (active of course). I recommend that you visit Micro Earnings board, and there, among other things, you can see my thread with a link that might help you in your search

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: So it takes you a week to earn 200 Satoshis?  Do you understand this is 800 Satoshis a month?  It is a complete waste of time.Is there nothing you can offer as a service on this Forum?  No skill?  Maybe you are talented and can do some Bitcoin related drawings to sell or auction?  This will 'generate' you so many more Satoshis than 800 a month.  At this pace, it takes you around 10 years to get .. almost 0.001 Bitcoin.  You are spending this time to make nothing.  Use the same time to find something more productive to do.  Hell, a lemonade stand would get you more!-Regards,PrivacyG
